mainEntity.name: What is the Black Screen tool?

acceptedAnswer.text: The Black Screen tool turns your screen completely black. It's perfect for testing monitors, using as a dark background, or focusing without distractions.

mainEntity.name: Can I use it as a light-off screen or night mode?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. Many people use the black screen to reduce glare or light while watching movies, resting, or sleeping.

mainEntity.name: Does the black screen damage the display?

acceptedAnswer.text: No, it's completely safe. It simply displays a black color and doesn't affect your monitor or pixels.

mainEntity.name: Can I use it in full screen?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. Click the Full Screen button or press F11 for a borderless black display.
Once loaded, you can keep the black screen active even without an internet connection.
